Package test

Class CementBrick

Object
Brick
CementBrick
public class CementBrick extends Brick
The class for the Cement brick type. It inherits from the "Brick.Java" and implements the parent class' abstract method. It also consists of multiple attributes of the Cement brick such as the name, inner color, border color, and strength.
Author:
KhooChenNan

  • Constructor Details

    • CementBrick

      public CementBrick​(Point point, Dimension size)
      Constructor for the "CementBrick.Java" class. Takes in 2 input parameters like any other brick types: the coordinates and size. It then initializes the cracks and visuals.
      Parameters:
      point - The coordinates for the brick.
      size - The size for the brick.

  • Method Details

    • makeBrickFace

      protected Shape makeBrickFace​(Point pos, Dimension size)
      Description copied from class: test.Brick
      An abstract method as mentioned prior to this which will then be implemented later on by other brick type classes.
      Specified by:
      makeBrickFace in class Brick
      Parameters:
      pos - The coordinates of the brick.
      size - The size of the brick.
      Returns:
      The visual of the brick is returned.

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(Point2D point, int dir)
      Description copied from class: test.Brick
      Sets the impact of the brick by taking in 2 input parameters, its point and direction.
      Overrides:
      setImpact in class Brick
      Parameters:
      point - The coordinates of the brick.
      dir - The direction of the impact.
      Returns:
      If the brick is broken, it will return false. Else, it calls the impact() function and then returns the variable "broken".

    • getBrick

      public Shape getBrick()
      Description copied from class: test.Brick
      A method that gets the brick.
      Specified by:
      getBrick in class Brick
      Returns:
      A brick in Shape data type is returned.

    • updateBrick

      private void updateBrick()
      A function that updates the Brick. If the brick isn't broken, it will draw the cracking.

    • repair

      public void repair()
      A function that repairs the Cement brick. It calls the repair function from its parent class (Brick.Java), then resets and sets the visual for the brick equal to the parent class brick.
      Overrides:
      repair in class Brick
